name: pp-middleman-integration
description: Proof of concept integration using a middleman approach.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && cp -r src/config dist/config && tsc
scripts.build:watch: rm -rf dist/* && cp -r src/config dist/config && tsc --watch
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && npm version patch
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && npm version minor
scripts.release:major: npm run build && npm version major
scripts.release:quick: npm run build && git add -A && git commit -m 'Quick Release Patch' && npm version patch
scripts.gcloud:deploy: kubectl run `gcloud config get-value container/cluster` --image=gcr.io/`gcloud config get-value project`/`gcloud config get-value container/cluster`:v`node -p "require('./package.json').version"` --port=8000
scripts.gcloud:docker: gcloud docker -- push gcr.io/`gcloud config get-value project`/`gcloud config get-value container/cluster`:v`node -p "require('./package.json').version"`
scripts.gcloud:create: gcloud container clusters create `gcloud config get-value container/cluster` --machine-type=f1-micro && gcloud container clusters get-credentials `gcloud config get-value container/cluster`
scripts.gcloud:expose: kubectl expose deployment `gcloud config get-value container/cluster` --type=LoadBalancer --port=80 --target-port=8000
scripts.gcloud:quickstart: npm run docker:build && npm run gcloud:docker && npm run gcloud:create && npm run gcloud:deploy && npm run gcloud:expose
scripts.docker:build: docker build -t gcr.io/`gcloud config get-value project`/`gcloud config get-value container/cluster`:v`node -p "require('./package.json').version"` .
scripts.postversion: git push --tags && npm run docker:build && npm run gcloud:docker

author: Andrew Throener
